subtypes.description: Owns the brand and manufactures a meaningful share of major appliances.
subtypes.incentives: funds dealer/distributor rebates (volume/tier/growth/mix), STA/promo allowances, co-op/MDF, price protection, display/demo, training/cert; occasional spiffs/launch bonuses.

subtypes.description: Owns the brand + GTM; outsources some/all production while controlling programs and warranty/service policy.
subtypes.incentives: same channel menu as above (rebates/STA/MDF/price protection/display/demo/training; occasional spiffs).

subtypes.description: Builds appliances to the brand owner's specs and ships under the brand owner's name.
subtypes.incentives: rarely dealer-facing; uses commercial terms with the brand owner (contract pricing, volume breaks, capacity/allocation, tooling/NRE, quality/chargebacks, supply assurance).

subtypes.description: Designs a product platform and manufactures it; brands choose variants and badge it.
subtypes.incentives: rarely dealer-facing; platform/contract terms (MOQ/volume tiers, pricing, exclusivity, tooling/NRE, allocation, quality terms).

subtypes.description: Produces appliances sold under a retailer/distributor/dealer-group house brand.
subtypes.incentives: margin + volume tiers + MDF-like marketing support (more commercial + marketing, less spiff-y).

subtypes.description: Holds regional rights to sell/support a brand; runs compliance, distribution, warranty/service, and channel programs.
subtypes.incentives: funds/administers rebates/STA/MDF/price protection/training plus freight/stocking/service-coverage terms.

notes.oem_vs_odm: OEM builds your design/spec; ODM sells their platform for you to badge.

subtypes.description: Buys bulk, holds inventory, extends credit/logistics, resells to retailers/dealers.
subtypes.incentives: volume/tier rebates, growth bonuses, STA/bill-backs pass-through, MDF/co-op pass-through, freight/warehouse allowances, stock-rotation/returns programs.

subtypes.description: Aggregates independents to negotiate pricing/programs and enforce compliance.
subtypes.incentives: group rebates, pooled MDF/co-op, compliance/assortment bonuses, event/line-review funding, member dividends (from earned rebates).

subtypes.description: Territory sales coverage without owning inventory; drives line reviews, training, merchandising execution.
subtypes.incentives: commissions, performance bonuses, launch incentives, training/event budgets tied to targets.

subtypes.description: Warehousing/last-mile/reverse logistics supporting appliance flow.
subtypes.incentives: SLA bonuses/penalties, volume pricing, peak-capacity commitments (operational levers vs classic rebates).

subtypes.description: Sells to consumers via stores/ecomm; often bundles delivery/install/financing.
subtypes.incentives: STA/promo allowances, MDF/co-op, display/demo, price protection, volume/tier rebates, assortment/compliance bonuses, digital merchandising funds.

subtypes.description: Consultative seller; often premium mix with delivery/install coordination.
subtypes.incentives: dealer rebates (volume/tier/growth/mix), spiffs/contests, MDF/co-op, display/demo, training/cert bonuses, bundle/attach bonuses, price protection.

subtypes.description: Local operator under a parent retail brand; execution is local, purchasing may be centralized.
subtypes.incentives: retailer/dealer menu + operational/compliance bonuses (assortment, merchandising, service levels).

subtypes.description: Influences what gets installed (packages, finishes, brands).
subtypes.incentives: specifier programs, referral/lead fees where allowed, training/cert perks, event/showroom support, project support.

subtypes.description: Volume buyer for new construction packages.
subtypes.incentives: contract pricing, project rebates, volume tiers, model-home/demo allowances, extended terms, supply assurance/allocation.

subtypes.description: Executes remodel/new build and steers product selection via recommendations/logistics control.
subtypes.incentives: project rebates, lead/referral where allowed, install allowances, training/cert support, jobsite delivery/coordination support.

subtypes.description: Performs delivery/hook-up/haul-away; drives CX outcomes.
subtypes.incentives: per-install payments, quality/first-time-completion bonuses, certification/training stipends, peak-season capacity bonuses.

subtypes.description: Handles warranty repairs; shapes brand reputation and repeat purchase.
subtypes.incentives: labor rate/parts margin structures, SLA bonuses, certification incentives, diagnostics/training support.

subtypes.description: Individual point-of-sale influencer.
subtypes.incentives: spiffs, contests, attach bonuses, training/cert bonuses, launch incentives.

subtypes.description: Drives demand via content/reviews/referrals (more selective in appliances).
subtypes.incentives: affiliate commissions, paid sponsorships, promo codes, performance bonuses, content budgets.
